name: Domain of Blessing: Harmony III
description:
After the accident at the Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering, many masterless constructs went out of control, wandering aimlessly about the caverns around the shore of the lake, waiting for orders that will never come.
If you can destroy the out-of-control clockwork meka, you will obtain the precious artifacts within.
disorder: When a character recovers or loses HP, all your party members' CRIT DMG increases by 7% for 10s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.1s. Max 10 stacks. Each stack's duration is counted independently.
